description: Antoine Griezmann ends a sponsorship deal with the Chinese firm over claims of surveillance.
title: Football star Griezmann severs ties with Huawei over Uighurs
title_page: Football star Griezmann severs ties with Huawei over Uighurs - BBC News
maintext: "We would like to extend an invitation to speak to him personally, to explain the work that is currently being done at the highest level, inside the company, to address the issues of human rights, equality, and discrimination at all levels, and to reassure him, and all our customers and partners, that Huawei takes these concerns very seriously."
